name: Goats N Goblins
description:
You are a goat trapped in the infinite abyss! Take out as many of your natural enemy, goblins, as you can before you die of goat cancer in approximately 3 minutes. Made for DevLUp Fall 2022 Game Jam "Just Pick One"

Controls:

Full controls in game

Z to jump

X to dash

C to use an item

Credits:

Programming and Level Design - Kate

Art - Juno

Music - Natalie
